code: import React from'react';import{useSearchParams}from'react-router-dom';import'./Tabs.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TABS=[{id:'all',label:'All',param:''},{id:'images',label:'Images',param:'isch'},{id:'news',label:'News',param:'nws'},{id:'videos',label:'Videos',param:'vid'},{id:'more',label:'More',param:''}];const Tabs=_ref=>{let{activeTab='all',onTabChange}=_ref;const[searchParams,setSearchParams]=useSearchParams();const handleTabClick=tab=>{const newParams=new URLSearchParams(searchParams);if(tab.param){newParams.set('tbm',tab.param);}else{newParams.delete('tbm');}setSearchParams(newParams);onTabChange===null||onTabChange===void 0?void 0:onTabChange(tab.id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"tabs","aria-label":"Search result types",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tabs-container",children:TABS.map(tab=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"tab ".concat(activeTab===tab.id?'active':''),onClick:()=>handleTabClick(tab),"aria-current":activeTab===tab.id?'page':undefined,"aria-label":"".concat(tab.label," results"),children:tab.label},tab.id))})});};export default Tabs;
